name: Lunar Leeper
overview: There are cries for help from the planet Opthamalia. Your crew has got lost on the valley of the Leepers! These fearsome Lunar Leepers are omnivores and they especially like to eat everything that moves! These creatures feature two long gum-like legs, a single eye and a massively green beak. As they can eat up a whole spaceship with ease, you are well aware of the danger in which your crew is. So you gather all your courage and try to rescue them... And you also have to execute your primary order: to destroy this "Eyeball"...
